DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim clinical trial evaluate variability blood glucose-lowering effect NN1250 ( insulin degludec ) subject type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating Within-subject Variability NN1250 Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Male female age 1865 year ( inclusive ) Type 1 diabetes mellitus ( diagnose clinically ) least 12 month Body mass index 18.028.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Subject donate blood plasma past month 500 mL within 3 month prior screen Smoker ( define subject smoke 5 cigarette equivalent per day ) Not able willing refrain smoking use nicotine gum transdermal nicotine patch inpatient period
